summary.title: IOT Prototype Threat Model
summary.description: Threat modelling diagram for an IOT prototype which monitors CO2 concentrations in the Air.

cells.description: The brains of the prototype and is an electronic hardware development/prototyping board. This is used to power the sensors and get appropriate values with the use of software and any other processing required like in our case calculating AQI.

threats.title: Impersonating the device for illicit purposes
Modification or destruction of the device or it's sensors

cells.description: DHT 22 - This is a Humidity and Temperature sensor.
MQ 135 - This is a Gas sensor which offers a low-cost solution for detecting the concertation of gases in the Air (especially CO2) in PPM (parts per million).
This is an app that retrieves the data sent by the controller through serial.

threats.title: Unauthorised access to data or Software which stores API keys

cells.description: This is a computer the controller is connected to.

threats.title: Impersonating the device for illicit purposes

cells.description: Flashes the controller with new firmware

threats.title: Eavesdropping attack or Unauthorised data access
Eavesdropping attack or Unauthorised data access
